thread.title: BRIEF-Rollins Inc Says It ‍Purchased Stock Of Ames Group Ltd And Kestrel Pest Control Ltd

title: BRIEF-Rollins Inc Says It ‍Purchased Stock Of Ames Group Ltd And Kestrel Pest Control Ltd

organizations.name: brief-rollins inc says it ‍purchased stock of ames group ltd
group ltd and kestrel pest control ltd reuters staff

text: February 28, 2018 / 2:25 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Rollins Inc Says It ‍Purchased Stock Of Ames Group Ltd And Kestrel Pest Control Ltd Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 28 (Reuters) - Rollins Inc: * ROLLINS INC - ‍PURCHASED STOCK OF AMES GROUP LIMITED AND KESTREL PEST CONTROL LIMITED, BOTH COMPANIES OPERATING IN UK​ * ROLLINS INC - ‍OWNERS ALAN AND JOANNE READ WILL STAY ON TO RUN AMES GROUP LIMITED OPERATIONS​ * ROLLINS INC - ‍OWNER RICHARD BORLASE WILL STAY ON WITH KESTREL PEST CONTROL LIMITED IN A SALES POSITION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
